newsitem.title: ITALY: Minimum rate rises at Italy lira repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Minimum rate rises at Italy lira repo tender.

text.p: The minimum rate at today's 5.5 trillion lire two-day Bank of Italy repurchase tender was 7.29 percent compared with 6.99 percent at the previous repo tender on May 5, the Bank said.
The average rate was 7.34 percent against 7.01 percent at the last repurchase pact for 6.5 trillion lire and 28 days.
The pact covers purchases today and the securities are for resale on May 15. The Bank said it received 30 bids of which 12 were met in full and two in part.
